projects.name: Quizz
projects.description: Quizz is a real-time quizzing application much like Kahoot. I built this project as a fun way to develop my skills using websockets. It uses a packet system for real-time communication, featuring a scoring system, quiz editor, and an easy way to join quizzes.

projects.name: PersonalWebsite V2
projects.description: This second iteration of my person website features a new design. It now uses multiple pages to split content and make it easer to manage website flow. I can now easily add new content to the site and iterate on design and features.

projects.name: Custom Fishing Minecraft Plugin
projects.description: Custom Fishing is a Minecraft server addon that allows players to fish up a customized pool of rewards greater than that of regular Minecraft. It allows for extensive customization and effects that play on a successfull catch, along with the ability to setup certain fishing zones with increased chances for certain rewards!

projects.name: Custom Tab Minecraft Plugin
projects.description: Custom Tab is a Minecraft server addon that reinvents the player list system that is normally used to just show online players. It allows you to display custom headings and footers on the list, while also allowing you to edit the list itself. You can display custom information in certain columns and sections in the player list and pull data from countless other minecraft plugins.

projects.name: Mist Plugin Development Library
projects.description: Mist is a Kotlin Development Library used to quickly and easily create Minecraft Plugins. It contains many useful helper classes for common tasks and plugin infrastructure to quickly plug and play plugins together. Contains systems for things like localisation, configuration managment, async task handling, and much more!
